This is the directory for bundles/frameworks/stuff needed to build atv-xbmc-tools.
currently needed:
-AppleTV.framework (just copy from ATV)
-BackRow.framework (new ATV 2.3 is needed: http://wiki.awkwardtv.org/wiki/BackRow_2.3)

todo:
-write a handy script to pull the needed frameworks from an ATV
-document where which Framework is needed}
